title: I'm Spying On YOU!
description:
Did you know that i'm spying on you? Well not just you but anyone who is watching this video! That's just the way YouTube and many other sites work.
So today let's discuss how websites collect data and how it's used.

Should you be concern or is it just normal? Lets discuss!

Check out our new tech moves with: https://internetfactory.substack.com/

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!

#data #technology #spy
